text: John Edward Burton III (born October 25, 1961) is an American racecar driver. He last drove in the NASCAR Sprint cup series in 2007. Burton has five Sprint cup wins, including the 2002 Daytona 500. Burton's brother Jeff drives in the Sprint cup series for Richard Childress Racing. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Daytona 500 winners Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Virginia
title: Ward Burton
